description: Enjoy a refreshing kayaking adventure on the Werse River, surrounded by lush greenery and tranquil waters.

locationInfo.description: A scenic river route perfect for a leisurely kayak trip, offering beautiful nature views and peaceful surroundings.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket for safety.
Stay aware of other boaters and natural currents.

description: Explore the historic Burg Hülshoff, a picturesque castle with fascinating exhibitions on Annette von Droste-Hülshoff’s life and work.

locationInfo.description: A historical castle featuring lush gardens, literary exhibits, and guided tours that immerse visitors in Münster’s cultural heritage.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable shoes for walking on uneven surfaces.
Respect historical artifacts and follow tour guide instructions.

description: Take a scenic bike ride from Münster to the charming district of Roxel, passing through picturesque countryside and small villages.

locationInfo.description: A well-maintained cycling route leading to Roxel, where you can take a break at a local café or explore the town’s landmarks.
safetyTips: Wear a helmet and obey traffic rules.
Bring a water bottle to stay hydrated during the ride.

description: Explore the diverse ecosystems of Rieselfelder Münster, a nature reserve perfect for birdwatching and photography.

locationInfo.description: A scenic reserve with a variety of bird species, wetlands, and observation platforms, making it an ideal destination for nature lovers.
safetyTips: Bring binoculars for better birdwatching experience.
Stick to marked trails to protect the wildlife habitat.

description: Unwind by the scenic Hiltruper See, where you can enjoy a lakeside walk, grab a coffee, or simply soak in the peaceful surroundings.

locationInfo.description: A beautiful lake with walking trails, seating areas, and a café nearby—perfect for a relaxing afternoon outing.
safetyTips: Bring sunscreen to protect from sun exposure.
Be mindful of cyclists and joggers on the shared paths.
